title: Dedication to Augustus?
support: No description, but perhaps a statue base?

handNote.lettering: Dessau's apograph as presented by Mommsen in CIL add. suggests NT in ligature.

date._: Augustus as pontifex maximus (12 BCE onwards) and with tribunician potestas between XI and XIV (13-9 BCE), so between 12 and 9 BCE.

provenanceFound._: First recorded in Taormina in 1756 in a letter of Ignazio Cartella (writing from Taormina, reporting three fragmentary inscriptions that he has acquired). Seen by Dessau in a courtyard of the Hotel Bellevue (later Metropole) shortly before 1883, and not seen since.
